description:
According to the woke mob, your life should be destroyed if you dare go against leftist dogma. And the worst sin of all is standing up for women at a time when the patriarchy is doing everything in its power to destroy their rights.

HBO standing by JK Rowling being part of the creation of new Harry Potter series- despite attempts to cancel her over her women’s rights advocacy.

“J.K. Rowling has a right to express her personal views. We will remain focused on the development of the new series, which will… pic.twitter.com/rUUHYaZTu5
— Oli London (@OliLondonTV) November 20, 2024
title: HBO makes surprising stand, SUPPORTS JK Rowling: “She has a right to express her personal views”

description:
Sunny Hostin expressed a sign of exhaustion, as she is very tired of reading the same legal notice for the third time this week. However, it’s unclear why she does not just stop misleading her viewers and report the truth but that’s not her intent.

Sunny Hostin sighs as she's forced to, for the third time this week, read a legal note about The View's claims against Matt Gaetz and Pete Hegseth.
Joy Behar then baselessly accuses Hegseth of witness tampering. No legal note was provided for that false claim. pic.twitter.com/7nkA16D42Q
— Nicholas Fondacaro (@NickFondacaro) November 22, 2024
title: Watch: They made Sunny Hostin read a THIRD legal note over horrible comments about Trump officials
